name: Context Enricher
description: Provides additional context and background information
content: Please provide additional context and background information that would help understand the topic better. Include relevant details, examples, or explanations that enhance comprehension.

name: Step-by-Step Guide
description: Breaks down complex processes into clear, actionable steps
content: Please break this down into clear, numbered steps with actionable instructions. Each step should be specific and easy to follow, with any necessary sub-steps or considerations included.

name: Examples Generator
description: Requests practical examples to illustrate concepts
content: Please provide concrete, practical examples that demonstrate this concept or process. Include at least 2-3 different examples that show various applications or scenarios.

name: Best Practices
description: Emphasizes industry best practices and standards
content: Focus on industry best practices and established standards. Highlight what experts recommend and why these approaches are considered optimal. Include any common pitfalls to avoid.

name: Beginner Friendly
description: Adapts content for beginners with simple explanations
content: Please explain this in beginner-friendly terms. Avoid jargon and technical terms where possible, or explain them clearly when used. Use simple language and analogies that make concepts easy to understand.

name: Advanced Analysis
description: Provides deeper, more technical analysis for experts
content: Provide an advanced, technical analysis suitable for experts. Include detailed explanations, technical considerations, edge cases, and sophisticated approaches. Assume deep knowledge of the subject matter.

name: Pros and Cons
description: Analyzes advantages and disadvantages of different approaches
content: Please provide a balanced analysis of pros and cons. List the advantages and disadvantages of different approaches or options. Include potential trade-offs and considerations for decision-making.

name: Time-Sensitive
description: Emphasizes urgency and quick implementation
content: Focus on quick, immediate solutions that can be implemented right away. Prioritize speed and efficiency over perfection. Highlight the most important actions to take first.

name: Cost-Conscious
description: Focuses on budget-friendly and cost-effective solutions
content: Please prioritize cost-effective solutions and budget-friendly approaches. Consider the financial implications and suggest ways to minimize costs while maintaining quality and effectiveness.

name: Creative Approach
description: Encourages innovative and creative solutions
content: Think outside the box and provide creative, innovative solutions. Explore unconventional approaches and unique perspectives. Encourage experimentation and original thinking.

name: Risk Assessment
description: Identifies potential risks and mitigation strategies
content: Please identify potential risks and challenges that might arise. Suggest mitigation strategies and contingency plans. Consider what could go wrong and how to prepare for or prevent issues.

name: Actionable Outcomes
description: Emphasizes concrete, actionable results
content: Focus on concrete, actionable outcomes and deliverables. Provide specific tasks, deadlines, and measurable results. Make sure everything can be implemented and tracked effectively.

name: Professional Tone
description: Formal and professional communication style
content: Maintain a professional, formal tone throughout the response. Use appropriate business language and avoid casual expressions.

name: Casual and Friendly
description: Conversational and approachable communication style
content: Use a casual, friendly tone that feels conversational and approachable. Feel free to use everyday language and maintain a warm, welcoming style.

name: Enthusiastic
description: Energetic and positive communication style
content: Be enthusiastic and energetic! Use exclamation points and positive language to convey excitement and motivation about the topic.

name: Empathetic
description: Understanding and supportive communication style
content: Respond with empathy and understanding. Acknowledge any challenges or frustrations, and provide supportive, encouraging guidance.

name: Humorous
description: Light-hearted and entertaining communication style
content: Add some humor and wit to make the response entertaining. Use appropriate jokes, puns, or funny analogies to keep things light and engaging.

name: Concise
description: Brief and to-the-point communication style
content: Keep the response concise and to the point. Focus on the essential information and avoid unnecessary elaboration.

name: Detailed
description: Comprehensive and thorough communication style
content: Provide a detailed, comprehensive response. Include thorough explanations, background information, and complete coverage of the topic.

name: Question-Driven
description: Encourages deeper thinking through questions
content: Include thoughtful questions throughout the response to encourage deeper thinking and self-reflection about the topic.

name: ðŸ§ª TEST: Tone Casual

content: Provide essential context and key points that enhance understanding. Focus on the most important information without overwhelming detail.

name: ðŸ§ª TEST: Quality - Best Practices Focus

content: Focus on industry best practices, established standards, and quality approaches. Highlight what experts recommend and proven methodologies.

name: ðŸ§ª TEST: Quality - Error Prevention

name: ðŸ§ª TEST: Analysis - Comparative

content: Provide a comparative analysis examining different approaches, options, or solutions. Include pros and cons, trade-offs, and decision criteria.

name: ðŸ§ª TEST: Analysis - Data-Driven

content: Support findings with data, metrics, and evidence-based insights. Include statistics, benchmarks, and quantitative analysis where relevant.

name: ðŸ§ª TEST: Technical - Advanced Implementation

content: Provide deep technical implementation details, architectural considerations, and advanced technical approaches. Include code examples, technical specifications, and expert-level guidance.

name: ðŸ§ª TEST: Technical - Architecture Focus
description: Focuses on system architecture and design patterns
content: Focus on system architecture, design patterns, and scalability considerations. Include architectural diagrams, component interactions, and system design principles.

name: ðŸ§ª TEST: Productivity - Action-Oriented
description: Emphasizes actionable tasks and immediate steps
content: Focus on actionable tasks, immediate next steps, and concrete deliverables. Provide clear timelines, specific actions, and measurable outcomes.

name: ðŸ§ª TEST: Productivity - Efficiency Focus
description: Optimizes for speed and efficiency in execution
content: Optimize for speed and efficiency. Prioritize quick wins, streamlined processes, and time-saving approaches. Focus on getting results fast.

name: ðŸ§ª TEST: Creative - Innovative Solutions
description: Encourages out-of-the-box thinking and innovation
content: Think outside the box and explore innovative, creative solutions. Consider unconventional approaches, breakthrough ideas, and unique perspectives.

name: ðŸ§ª TEST: Creative - Experimental Approach
description: Promotes experimentation and creative exploration
content: Encourage experimentation and creative exploration. Suggest pilot projects, prototypes, and iterative approaches to discover new possibilities.

name: ðŸ§ª TEST: Mixed Tags - Professional Analysis
description: Combines professional tone with analytical approach
content: Provide professional analysis with formal tone and structured approach. Combine business acumen with analytical rigor and evidence-based conclusions.

name: ðŸ§ª TEST: Mixed Tags - Creative Technical
description: Combines creativity with technical implementation
content: Blend creative thinking with technical implementation. Explore innovative technical solutions while maintaining practical feasibility and implementation clarity.
